issue.title: [C++] Rebase https://github.com/apache/parquet-cpp/pull/462# onto arrow repo
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4279](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4279). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The old commit needs to be change to be a PR against the arrow repo and not parquet-cpp.

Changes needed as part of this:

1.  Allow for running both old and new code path until performance regression can be eliminated.

2.  Instead of passing through nthreads consider using util/task-group from arrow as a parameter.
